attributes.action: To preserve British Rail units 319 008 and 319 009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When the 319's are removed from service which may not be a long way away as First Capital Connect are going to get over 27 class 377 units please make sure 319 008 and 319 009 is preserved.

319 008 and 319 009 were the first 2 trains to pass through the Channel Tunnel. because of this the these 2 units should be kept in a museum for all to admire as they are part of britians railway heritage.
